I feel like I’m living in a dream,
You’re more calming than a beautiful stream.
Your smile like a thousand sunsets,
And you look like a dancing silhouette.

When we Dance and prance, the world seems to vanish,
And My time with you always feels so lavish,
Your laugh and giggle completely contagious,
And you always seem to be so gracious.

Your touch brings out a million butterflies,
And you’re more pretty than a thousand skies.
I love it when we get to walk and talk,
Thank you for entering my ever growing heart

As we walk and talk, I begin to smile,
Park in sight, and I feel like we’re in style.
I look over and see big ol grin,
The feeling of warm sunshine fills within.

As we approach, our walk turns into a run,
We laugh and play, ive never had more fun.
Tickling and joyous laughter fills the air,
You smile and then I know we have something rare.

Then as you pull me in, all seems to fade,
Staring in to your eyes you left me serenade.
Your subtle lips, pressed against mine,
A kiss so sweet, I never want to leave, it was truly divine.

As I Gaze upon the Curtains ah-head,
I can’t help but ponder, the beauty concealed;
The temptation accepted, where might it have led.
The curtains gaze has left me appealed.

As the curtains unveil my breath leaves me,
Left wondering, how grace has fallen upon my soul.
Your beauty surpasses that of a tranquil sea;
The sight of you has left me feeling whole.

As my eyes fall upon you, I’m left enchanted,
When you smiles, it leaves me a feeling of jubilee;
I feel that all my wishes have been granted,
Your happiness radiates felicity.

A thousand words can’t describe you well;
But you are the prettiest of them all.
